original: 北海朱虛人，三國時隱士。少時與華歆、邴原游學，三人並稱「一龍」。終生不仕，陳壽稱其：「淵雅高尚，確然不拔。」
text: Zhu Xuren of Beihai, a hermit in the Three Kingdoms period. When he was young, he studied with Hua Xin and Bingyuan, and the three of them were called "One Dragon." Chen Shou said, "Yuanya is noble and noble, and he is indeed not outstanding."
